PRO related queries.question: Give me baseline scores reported for Bavencio trials that used EQ-5D-5L as PRO instrument
PRO related queries.SQL query: select dpo.brand_name,dpo.instrument_name,dpo.nct_id,rg.title as result_group_title,om.title as outcome_title ,om.param_value as pro_score ,om.units,om.param_type as score_type from ctgov.outcome_measurements om join public.drug_trial_outcomes_pro dpo on om.outcome_id::varchar = dpo.outcome_id and om.nct_id::varchar = dpo.nct_id join public.drug_result_groups drg on om.nct_id = drg.nct_id and om.result_group_id::varchar = drg.result_group_id join ctgov.result_groups rg on drg.nct_id = rg.nct_id and drg.result_group_id = rg.id::varchar where dpo.brand_name = 'Ibrance' and dpo.instrument_name like '%EQ-5D-5L%' and (om.classification ilike any (array['%cycle 1 day 1%','%baseline%','%week 1 day 1%','%month 1 day 1%']));
PRO related queries.instructions: Always join drug_trial_outcomes_pro to outcome_measurements using nct_id and outcome_id both. Always type cast all id columns to VARCHAR.
